name: Chooos
overview:
What is Chooos?

Chooos is universal online shopping platform for social commerce. This new service helps people to find things they like in one click and of course we do care about business. Just picture There are billions of Internet users all over the world and most of them, same as you are social. Every day we discover our social timeline and follow our friends, funny & cute things, brands, favourite food or restourant. Why we do it? Because we like it!
Now everybody likes nike, coca colla, pizza or boo and we like it because we realy want it!. Do you want to play with that guy? Yes! The problem is, when we face online store we fail to keep all likes in our mind or just can’t find them. It SUCKS! Where is my beautifull pink self made pillow, my good new red italy lather shoes, my incredible hend made grass flip-flops that i dream about. So forget about search! Chooos has already chosen all things that you are holding in your mind. Just with one click you get offers that match your interest with extra delivery. Amazing! Sign up and enjoy your shopping.

But on other side there are millions of online and local stores which dream about loyal customers, unique visitors who keep coming back to their store, and of course they want to get it without spending a lot of money on advertising. The problem is, that online advertising is extremely expensive and stores can nothing to do. How we help them? Chooos scans users preferences & location from their social accounts and gives them all things they likes every day in real life. So if you have your online or local business sign up on chooos.com upload the products and get your extra target audience without advertising. Just do it

Chooos is beautifull, Chooos is crazy powerfull, it’s magical, It is all your dreams on the one site - that’s allready a revolution and it’s only just began. Support us to make our world easer!
